description: Companies want you to care about the distinction between “on device” and cloud artificial intelligence. You just want technology to work.
title: Apple and Microsoft want you to notice how their AI works. But why?

description: OpenAI expects the new model to bring the company closer to achieving “AGI,” or artificial general intelligence, a hotly contested idea that refers to computers matching the power of human brains.
title: OpenAI starts training a new AI model to power ChatGPT
